title: P4P Meet & Greet
abstract:
This is a meet-and-greet for Peer-4-Peer projects (local-first, P2P, OSS and offline-first). Join to say hello to old and new peers and catch the latest gossip of the networks.

The beginning will be a free-flowing hang out with origami & tea during followed by a mini workshop where participants get to know each other and the latest updates in the scene.
description: Image is revised through color change and added text. Original image source is CC-2.0-Generic via https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/File:Rhizomorph_(5211991289).jpg

persons.name: Mathias Jud
persons.biography: Mathias develops since over 25 years open-source projects. He created the OSINT project Zone*Interdite, developed censorship detection and circumvention software, as well as resilient communication tools. He is the project manager of  the off-the-grid P2P mesh communication messenger qaul.

persons.name: zelf
persons.biography:
Hello, I'm Zenna!

Originally from Scuttlebutt, I have now set out to explore the sea of distributed (p2p), local-fist and offline-first through research, collectively referred to as P4P. As part of this initiative I recently launched the www.p4p.wiki where I, and whomever would like to, can document P4P projects. Read my masters thesis on the topic here: https://works.hcommons.org/records/r486j-3cs81

Find me on mastodon: 
@zelf@sunbeam.city

Write me on signal @zelf.46 or DeltaChat (ask afk)
